article_metadata.description: The received wisdom of the start-up ecosystem is on thin ice in 2016. More than ever, more than ever, entrepreneurs and investors will need to look at a broader field of industries and business models and discard old precepts to capture the emerging opportunities.
article_metadata.author: Todd Hixon

og.description: The received wisdom of the start-up ecosystem is on thin ice in 2016. More than ever, more than ever, entrepreneurs and investors will need to look at a broader field of industries and business models and discard old precepts to capture the emerging opportunities.
og.title: The Venture Investment Outlook For 2016: Discontinuity And New Beginnings
